segments.text: I haven ’ t seen you in a while . How have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Things are going fairly well . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m hanging in there , but I lost my job and need to find another one quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am looking for a job myself . What were you thinking of doing next ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am just trying to find something that will pay the bills until this bad economy passes by .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you gotten any interviews yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t been out on one interview yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you thought about the electrician program over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that I might be interested in that position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we should go over there and see if we can apply for that program .
segments.speaker: S2
